metadata.description: Unified trading configuration with versioned algorithms for all strategy types
metadata.author: Algorithm Discovery System

long_term.name: Long-Term Investment Strategy

value_investing.query: ( {cash} ( latest "market cap" > 1000 and latest "p/e" < 20 and latest "return on equity" > 15 and latest "debt to equity" < 0.5 and latest close > 50 and latest volume > 10000 ) )

growth_investing.query: ( {cash} ( latest "market cap" > 500 and latest "return on equity" > 15 and latest close > latest sma(close,50) and latest volume > 50000 ) )

dividend_investing.query: ( {cash} ( latest "market cap" > 2000 and latest "dividend yield" > 2 and latest "p/e" < 15 and latest close > 100 ) )

value_investing.query: ( {cash} ( latest "market cap" > 1000 and latest "p/e" < 18 and latest "p/e" > 5 and latest "return on equity" > 18 and latest "debt to equity" < 0.4 and latest "current ratio" > 1.2 and latest close > 50 and latest volume > 15000 ) )
value_investing.description: High-quality value stocks with strong balance sheets

growth_investing.query: ( {cash} ( latest "market cap" > 500 and latest "return on equity" > 20 and latest "return on capital employed" > 18 and latest "p/e" < 25 and latest close > latest sma(close,20) and latest sma(close,20) > latest sma(close,50) and latest volume > 50000 ) )

quality_dividend.query: ( {cash} ( latest "market cap" > 2000 and latest "dividend yield" > 2.5 and latest "dividend yield" < 8 and latest "p/e" < 15 and latest "return on equity" > 15 and latest "debt to equity" < 0.6 and latest close > 150 and latest volume > 25000 ) )
quality_dividend.description: Quality dividend stocks with sustainable payouts

value_momentum.query: ( {cash} ( latest "market cap" > 1000 and latest "p/e" < 16 and latest "p/e" > 8 and latest "return on equity" > 20 and latest "debt to equity" < 0.3 and latest close > latest sma(close,50) and latest volume > latest sma(volume,20) * 1.3 and latest "current ratio" > 1.5 ) )
value_momentum.description: Value stocks with momentum and quality metrics

growth_quality.query: ( {cash} ( latest "market cap" > 800 and latest "return on equity" > 22 and latest "return on capital employed" > 20 and latest "p/e" < 22 and latest "debt to equity" < 0.5 and latest close > latest sma(close,20) and latest sma(close,20) > latest sma(close,50) and latest volume > 40000 ) )
growth_quality.description: High-quality growth stocks with strong fundamentals

dividend_aristocrats.query: ( {cash} ( latest "market cap" > 3000 and latest "dividend yield" > 3 and latest "dividend yield" < 7 and latest "p/e" < 12 and latest "return on equity" > 18 and latest "debt to equity" < 0.4 and latest "interest coverage" > 5 and latest close > 200 ) )

fallback_queries: ( {cash} ( latest "market cap" > 500 and latest close > 50 and latest volume > 10000 ) )
( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma(close,50) and latest volume > 20000 ) )

short_term.name: Short-Term Position Strategy

breakout_momentum.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma(close,20) and latest close > latest sma(close,50) and latest volume > latest sma(volume,20) * 1.5 and latest rsi(14) > 50 and latest rsi(14) < 80 ) )

volume_surge.query: ( {cash} ( latest volume > latest sma(volume,20) * 2 and latest close > latest open and latest close > latest sma(close,10) ) )

technical_breakout.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma(close,20) and latest sma(close,20) > latest sma(close,50) and latest volume > latest sma(volume,20) * 1.8 and latest rsi(14) > 55 and latest rsi(14) < 75 and latest "market cap" > 500 ) )

volume_price_surge.query: ( {cash} ( latest volume > latest sma(volume,20) * 2.5 and latest close > latest open * 1.02 and latest close > latest sma(close,10) and latest "market cap" > 300 ) )

momentum_continuation.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma(close,5) and latest sma(close,5) > latest sma(close,20) and latest volume > latest sma(volume,10) * 1.3 and latest rsi(14) > 60 and latest close > [0] 1 week ago close * 1.05 ) )

fallback_queries: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma(close,20) and latest volume > latest sma(volume,20) ) )

swing.name: Swing Trading Strategy

pullback_bounce.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma(close,50) and latest close < latest sma(close,20) and latest rsi(14) < 40 and latest volume > latest sma(volume,20) ) )

breakout_retest.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma(close,20) and latest close > latest sma(close,50) and latest volume > latest sma(volume,20) * 1.3 ) )

oversold_bounce.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma(close,50) and latest close < latest sma(close,20) and latest rsi(14) < 35 and latest rsi(14) > 25 and latest volume > latest sma(volume,20) * 1.2 and latest "market cap" > 500 ) )
oversold_bounce.description: Oversold bounce in uptrend with volume

flag_pattern.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma(close,20) and latest sma(close,20) > latest sma(close,50) and latest volume > latest sma(volume,20) * 1.5 and latest rsi(14) > 45 and latest rsi(14) < 70 and latest close > [0] 1 week ago close ) )

support_test.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma(close,50) * 0.98 and latest close > latest sma(close,50) * 1.02 and latest volume > latest sma(volume,20) and latest rsi(14) > 35 and latest rsi(14) < 55 ) )
support_test.description: Support level test with bounce potential

fallback_queries: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma(close,20) and latest volume > 30000 ) )
( {cash} ( latest rsi(14) > 40 and latest rsi(14) < 70 and latest volume > 20000 ) )

intraday.name: Intraday Trading Strategy

gap_up.query: ( {cash} ( latest open > [0] 1 day ago close * 1.02 and latest volume > latest sma(volume,20) * 1.5 ) )

momentum_spike.query: ( {cash} ( latest volume > latest sma(volume,20) * 3 and latest close > latest open and latest rsi(14) > 60 ) )

gap_momentum.query: ( {cash} ( latest open > [0] 1 day ago close * 1.015 and latest open < [0] 1 day ago close * 1.05 and latest volume > latest sma(volume,20) * 2 and latest close > latest open and latest "market cap" > 1000 ) )

volume_breakout.query: ( {cash} ( latest volume > latest sma(volume,20) * 4 and latest close > latest sma(close,5) and latest rsi(14) > 55 and latest rsi(14) < 80 and latest close > latest open * 1.01 ) )

morning_momentum.query: ( {cash} ( latest close > latest sma(close,5) and latest volume > latest sma(volume,5) * 2 and latest rsi(14) > 50 and latest close > latest open and latest "market cap" > 500 ) )

fallback_queries: ( {cash} ( latest volume > latest sma(volume,20) and latest close > latest open ) )
